p: Severe lower respiratory tract infection (sLRTI) due to adenovirus is well described in immunocompromised hosts. Adenovirus sLRTI is rare in immunocompetent hosts, especially adults, and evidence regarding symptoms, diagnosis and management in such instances remains limited. Here, we describe two cases of severe adenovirus in immunocompetent adults admitted to an intensive care unit in a large, teaching hospital in North West England.
